displayName.text: Harlem lil Dragons Kids Karate class

formattedAddress: 521 W 126th St, New York, NY 10027, USA

authorAttributions.displayName: Harlem lil Dragons Kids Karate class
Harlem lil Dragons Kids Karate class

adrFormatAddress: 521 W 126th St, New York, NY 10027-2407, USA

originalText.text: Master Anthony M Richards is absolutely amazing. I’ve known him since I was about 4 years old,  I am currently 29. He’s taught me so many life lessons when I was younger that I apply to my every day life now. I can also agree with Master Michelle Plummer, I know her very well, I remember when she started along with her family. I won’t ever attend a marshal art class unless it is taught by Master Richards or his respected colleagues. If you’re dedicated I promise you will succeed with him. EVERY tournament his students takes home first place. You won’t regret working with him.

originalText.text:
It's a really good class. Now a days it's hard to get my 3 year old out the house. But as soon as we get to karate class he is ready to start his class.  They adhere to all covid protocols and will continue to do so.

They offer zoom classes which is a plus. The Master is really old school with that said.  He doesn't go overboard nor is he harsh. but If you are really sensitive to how people speak to your children this class is not for you.

PROS:
-You can tell the kids really enjoy the classes
-it's an affordable class for twice a week classes

CONS:
- the classes aren't always split into age groups (which isn't always bad)

originalText.text:
Master Richards who holds a 7th degree black belt for over 45 years, in Tang Soo Do and Tae Kwan Do. Master Richards has been my dedicated instructor for over 14 years.  His ability to teach not only the physical and historical significance of the martial arts while using the five code of Bushido: Honesty, Concern, Respect, Humility and Discipline.   He will often state that with discipline all other's will follow.
Master Richard, has helped countless children from all ethnic backgrounds. He teaches everyone to achieve their highest psychical and academic goals.

Master Richards  works well with kids who are challenged which gives them a since of self worth.

All five of my kids studied under Master Richards.  One day he asked why don't join with the kid's and my response was NO WAY however, after much thought I decided to go for it.  I am currently Master Plummer..
Thank God..
Tang Soo

originalText.text:
Hi, All:
Responding to Ms. Jessica Barrios; we did not close!
Because of Gov. Cuomo's PAUSE order, we suspended in-person classes & will resume soon when NYC is in Phase 2 of the COVID Recovery Plan.
Reach out to me & stay safe until we meet again!
Best Regards,
Master Anthony Richards

originalText.text: I can’t begin to express how wonderful this studio is. They welcomed our family with open arms. They teach children how to be good humans that respect themselves and others. It is a gem in the Harlem community. I am so sad that they closed. Hopefully they will open up a new studio soon.
